sections.instruments: warm build, gentle crescendo, soft fullness
Fading choral voices, soft rain sounds, distant ocean waves

suno_lyrics:
[Verse]
Meet me in the heart of the forest
Make a bed of moss on the floor
Show me where the grass grows tallest
Where the greenest leaves are born
As long as there are flowers
I'll stay
With you in this quiet place
Take me back to my roots
Then I'll take care of you
The way I do
 
[Chorus]
When the sun turns the river gold
And you need somewhere safe to go
Call my name
And I'll take you home
'Cause you will always be mine to hold
So say my name
And I'll take you home
When you need somewhere safe to go
Call my name
And I'll take you home
'Cause you will always be mine to hold
So say my name
And I'll take you home
